title: my thunderbird is all mixed up!
content:
my main account used to get hundreds of messages. Now I'm only getting 1 (or less) a day.

But what's worse is that all my accounts are mixed up! I get a message for one account, but it's in the wrong account!

I wouldn't know how to do this on purpose, if I wanted to. Should I just delete all my messages? Should I kill and redefine all my accounts?

Thanks Ken Whitaker

title: importing ICS files into Calender
content:

I can add the ICS file but the right click edit option is disabled. I have noticed that "Provider for Google Calendar" an extension is disabled and I cannot enable it. It is incompatable with TB141. Up until this point the extension p[erated flawlessly. It was updated on July1 within a few days when I can document the problem begining.

title: Why does my Gmail automatically sign out after adding to Thunderbird?
content:
It's puzzling when you ask "Why does my Gmail automatically sign out?" after setting it up in Thunderbird, especially since desktop email clients usually maintain a continuous connection. The message "You have been signed out of this account. This may have happened automatically because another user signed in from the same browser" strongly suggests a conflict, but it's typically a browser-related error, not a direct Thunderbird logout.

The most likely culprit for Thunderbird losing access to your Gmail is an authentication issue. Modern Gmail access in Thunderbird relies on OAuth2, a secure protocol. If the OAuth2 token becomes invalid or expires, or if Thunderbird's internal web component (used for the OAuth2 login pop-up) has issues like cookies being disabled, it can repeatedly prompt you for login.

Less common, but possible, are: Google's security systems detecting unusual activity and temporarily blocking access, or, if you're not using OAuth2 and have 2-Step Verification enabled, an expired or revoked App Password. While less direct, a concurrent, conflicting sign-in in a web browser using the same Google account could also contribute to Google invalidating sessions.

To resolve this, ensure your Thunderbird Gmail account is configured to use OAuth2 for both incoming (IMAP) and outgoing (SMTP) server settings. Also, verify that Thunderbird is allowed to accept cookies under its Privacy & Security settings, as this is crucial for the OAuth2 process. Removing saved passwords for the Gmail account in Thunderbird and then restarting it can force a fresh OAuth2 re-authentication.
creator: hishi0729

title: Request to Resolve Phone Number Not Showing on Google Maps â€“ second life
content:
Google Business Profile Support Team I am writing to report an issue regarding our Google Business Profile for Second Life Rehabilitation Centre, a trusted Rehabilitation Centre in Delhi. We have noticed that our contact phone number is not appearing on our Google Maps listing, which is negatively affecting our ability to connect with people in need of urgent help.

We have verified that all information on our Google Business Profile is correctly entered and up to date. Despite this, the contact number is still not being displayed on Maps or Search results. As a Rehabilitation Centre in Delhi, timely communication is extremely critical for our patients and their families.

We kindly request you to look into this matter on priority and help us restore the visibility of our phone number on Google Maps and related search results.

Business Name: Second Life Rehabilitation Centre Website: https://www.secondliferehabilitationcentre.com Keyword: Rehabilitation Centre in Delhi Location: Delhi, India

Thank you for your support and assistance in resolving this issue at the earliest.
creator: secondliferehabilitationcentre

title: new desktop
content:
Thank you in advance....I am typing in tears...I am an elderly lady and I have used thunderbird (and contributed) for years! I just bought a new computer desktop. I was able to get my thunderbird account to my new computer but I had folders such as RECEIPTS; KEEP; IMPORTANT; DR. ROGERS; etc.

I have years worth of emails and things in these folders under 2 of my email addresses! I don't have them anywhere else and I am forever having to "prove" that I paid this or took care of that. Why didn't they come over? How can I get them to come over? I really need these folders' contents!

Please talk to me like I am 3 - you won't hurt my feelings!!! I have cognitive issues and have problems trying to remember and comprehend which is why I had all these folders to begin with. I have no children willing to make a trip to help me. 

I feel absolutely SICK to think I have lost all these important papers.

Thank you in advance...
creator: janbrock2020
